title: 19 - Degree of Ascension
description: It is an indicator that does not directly influence a person's life, showing only their development on the path back to the greatest possible energy, named God, Universe, All...

descendent.title: Degree of Ascension:
descendent.data: Spirit that reached a high degree of honors and, by transgressing Universal Laws, was demoted to a lower plane

illuminated.title: Degree of Ascension:
illuminated.data: Elevated spirit that came to this planet to enlighten other souls
